meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ted Johnson Theresa Tejada Liz Quesnelle Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7197.

div.div: Alex uses a cane during the closing credits chat.

td.p: Ted Johnson, a job seeker from Shoreview, Minnesota
Theresa Tejada, a project coordinator from Allen Park, Michigan
Liz Quesnelle, a retail store owner from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,001)

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES PULITZER WINNERS

tr.td: (Alex: And there have been a lot of them.)
ELEMENTARY SCHOOL
GEOGRPAPHIC FEATURES
SILENT KNIGHT
WE 3 "ING"S
OTHER CHRISTMAS SONGS
